name: SkyLand (Adonas)
description:
Survive as long as you can when the sky is falling and energy is slowly depleting.

AWSD - Only controls in the game.

A lot is unexplained in the game so I will explain here :D

Windmill island - Gives energy

Cannon island - Self explanatory

Gasstation island - gives speed

Chance scrolls - gives some energy or heath or even adds a slot for island (if it's removed)
